label: uncl4215
comment: Code specifying the payment method for transport charges.

values.label: Account
values.comment: The charges are to be charged to an account.

values.label: Cash on delivery service charge paid by consignor
values.comment: An indication that the consignor is responsible for the payment of the cash on delivery service charge.

values.label: Cash on delivery service charge paid by consignee
values.comment: An indication that the consignee is responsible for the payment of the cash on delivery service charge.

values.label: Insurance costs paid by consignor
values.comment: An indication that the consignor is responsible for the payment of the insurance costs.

values.label: Insurance costs paid by consignee
values.comment: An indication that the consignee is responsible for the payment of the insurance costs.

values.label: Goods collected from store
values.comment: Customer collects goods from the store.

values.label: Advance collect
values.comment: The amount of freight or other charge on a shipment advanced by one transportation line to another or to the shipper, to be collected from consignee.

values.label: Collect
values.comment: A shipment on which freight charges will be paid by consignee.

values.label: Collect, freight credited to payment customer
values.comment: The freight is collect but has been paid by the shipper and will be credited to that party.

values.label: Defined by buyer and seller
values.comment: The payment method for transport charges have been defined by the buyer and seller.

values.label: FOB port of call
values.comment: Title and control of goods pass to the buyer at port of call. Responsibility for export taxes and cost of documents for overseas shipments have not been specified.

values.label: Information copy, no payment due
values.comment: Transaction set has been provided for information only.

values.label: Mixed
values.comment: The consignment is partially collect and partially prepaid.

values.label: Service freight, no charge
values.comment: The consignment is shipped on a service basis and there is no freight charge.

values.label: Not specified
values.comment: The payment method for transport charges have not been specified.

values.label: Advance prepaid
values.comment: Costs have been paid in advance.

values.label: Customer pick-up/backhaul
values.comment: Buyer's private carriage picks up the goods as a return load to the buyer's facility.

values.label: Prepaid but charged to customer
values.comment: shipping charges have been paid in advance of shipment but are charged back to consignee usually as line item on invoice for the purchased goods.

values.label: Payable elsewhere
values.comment: Place of payment not known at the begin of conveyance.

values.label: Prepaid only
values.comment: Payment in advance of freight and/or other charges prior to delivery of shipment at destination, usually by shipper at point of origin.

values.label: Prepaid (by seller)
values.comment: Seller of goods makes payment to carrier for freight charges prior to shipment.

values.label: Pickup
values.comment: Customer is responsible for payment of pickup charges at shipping point.

values.label: Return container freight paid by customer
values.comment: The freight for returning the container is paid by the customer.

values.label: Return container freight free
values.comment: There is no freight charge for returning the container.

values.label: Return container freight paid by supplier
values.comment: The freight charge for returning the container is paid by the supplier.

values.label: Third party pay
values.comment: A third party, someone other than buyer or seller, is identified as responsible for payment of shipping charges.

values.label: Weight condition
values.comment: The payment method for transport charges are due to the weight.

values.label: Paid by supplier
values.comment: Transport charges will be paid by the supplier.

values.label: Paid by buyer
values.comment: Transport charges will be paid by the buyer.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
